plays.text: Penalty to Samuel Pahlsson 2 minutes for Holding Paul Ranheim
Penalty to German Titov 2 minutes for Crosschecking Kim Johnsson
Penalty to Simon Gagne 2 minutes for High Sticking Ruslan Salei
Goal scored by Jeff Friesen unassisted
Penalty to Kevin Sawyer 2 minutes for Interference Eric Desjardins

Penalty to Eric Desjardins 2 minutes for Roughing Kevin Sawyer
Penalty to Billy Tibbetts 2 minutes for Slashing Kevin Sawyer
Penalty to Billy Tibbetts 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Denny Lambert 2 minutes for Roughing Chris Therien
Penalty to Chris Therien 2 minutes for Roughing Kevin Sawyer
Goal scored by Simon Gagne unassisted
Goal scored by John LeClair assisted by Adam Oates and Mark Recchi
